agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Judiciary & Civil Jurisprudence TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, March 25, 2019 PLACE: E2.026 CHAIR: Rep. Jeff Leach Public testimony will be limited to three (3) minutes. Invited testimony will be offered at the discretion of the Chair. The order in which bills are heard will be at the discretion of the Chair. HB 16 Leach | et al. Relating to enforcement of the rights of a living child born after an abortion; creating a civil cause of action. HB 2826 Bonnen, Greg | et al. Relating to procurement of a contingent fee contract for legal services by a state agency or political subdivision. HB 2251 Capriglione Relating to certain deceptive advertising of legal services; imposing civil penalties. HB 1693 Smithee Relating to affidavits concerning cost and necessity of services. HB 1744 Smithee Relating to limitations periods in arbitration proceedings. HB 2064 Murphy Relating to recovery of the funds of an estate delivered to the comptroller. HB 1494 Guillen Relating to surety bonds for deputy clerks and other employees of county and district clerks. HB 3557 Paddie Relating to civil liability for engaging in certain conduct involving a critical infrastructure facility. HB 1793 Schaefer Relating to a suit against The University of Texas at Tyler. HB 3553 Farrar Relating to filing fees for the electronic filing system established by the Supreme Court of Texas. HB 3562 Farrar Relating to forms for creating or revoking a transfer on death deed. HB 2891 White Relating to recovery of attorney's fees against veterinarians for certain claims. HB 2096 Krause Relating to mandatory disclosure of third-party litigation financing agreements. HB 2375 Johnson, Julie Relating to the enforcement of certain arbitration agreements. HB 2376 Johnson, Julie Relating to the award of attorney's fees in certain civil actions. HB 2259 Smith Relating to uncollectible fees and costs in criminal actions and proceedings. HB 2435 Smith Relating to the confidentiality of the home or residence address of a state or federal judge or the judge's spouse in certain government records and documents. HB 2929 Leach Relating to hospital liens. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
